accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.subtitle: How accurate is your shared location?
accuracy.description: With accuracy, you are able to determine the precision of your device location. The value for accuracy defines a radius, in which the retrieved location usually lays in. Therefore a higher value is more imprecise and potentially has the effect of degrading service quality, while improving your privacy.
accuracy.detailDescription:
There are 4 accuracy-levels available:
as accurate as possible always uses the best accuracy availabe on this device.
fairly accurate accurate up to 100m, which is viable for most use cases.
coarse accurate up to 500m, which is usable for coarse orientation.
very coarse accurate up to 1km, which is usable for very coarse orientation.

interval.title: Interval
interval.subtitle: How often is your location accessed?
interval.description: Using the interval you can determine, how often this app is able to retrieve a new location from your device. A higher value therefore leads to a less frequent retrieval of your devices location. Example: If you've set to 10 Minutes, this means a new location is at maximum retrieved every 10 Minutes. In the meantime the previously retrieved location is used, which of course it might up to 10 Minutes old, which could potentially degrade the service quality.
interval.detailDescription:
There are 4 interval-levels available:
as frequent as possible always uses the most recent location availabe on this device.
fairly frequent requests new locations every minute.
infrequent requests new locations every 10 minutes.
very infrequent requests new locations every 30 minutes.

continuousAccess.title: Continuous locations
continuousAccess.subtitle: Continuously use your current location, e.g. to navigate

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: How do your preferences affect your privacy?
privacy.description: You have the ability to choose, which location data you want to share how. This has immediate effects on your personal privacy.
privacy.detailDescription:
high best privacy, no vulnerable data is shared.
medium-high moderate privacy, little vulnerable data is shared.
medium-low low privacy, some vulnerable data is shared.
low worst privacy, all vulnerable data is shared.

quality.title: Service quality
quality.subtitle: How do your preferences affect the service quality?
quality.description: You have the ability to choose, which location data you want to share how. This has immediate effects on the quality of service our app can offer.
quality.detailDescription:
high best service quality, all features working as intended.
medium-high moderate service quality, most features nearly working as intended.
medium-low low service quality, features working with reduced functionality.
low worst service quality, features not working as intended.
